resources.string:
• Tap the corresponding alignment in Ranked Mode to confirm a player's position or role.

• You can use the same role tracker in the Ranked Practice mode as well!

• The role tracker will let you know if you attempt to duplicate a unique role =P

• Don't leave a game mode unless you are done with the game, it will be reset upon leaving!

• Be sure to put in your own role!

• The info tab contains a list of all investigative results for Sheriff and Investigator in their respective pages.

• Even if you are an evil role, keep track of the remaining alignments to determine what roles you can claim.

• Got Vampires? Be careful of those you've already assumed to be town!
Will be implemented in an upcoming update!

This is a fan-made app dedicated to assist fellow townies in-game as well as serve as a reference manual. It features an intuitive role tracker for classic and ranked modes that helps make it easier for players to determine the remaining roles, which can be useful for any role in the game! The reference provided is very useful for dealing with meta-gaming jailors (you know who you are) as well as for increasing your general game knowledge. Future updates will include a role tracker for other game modes, additional reference material such as strategies and achievements, and changes according to new patches. Don\'t forget to leave a review to let me know what you\'d like to see next! From one townie to another, thank you for downloading this app. And in Ranked Practice, I go by ChocMilkJr, so feel free to let me know what you think about this app =).

Town of Salem is a browser-based game that challenges players on their ability to convincingly lie as well as detect when other players are lying. The game ranges from 7 to 15 players. These players are randomly divided into alignments - Town, Mafia, and Neutrals. If you are a Town member (the good guys) you must track down the Mafia and other villains before they kill you. The catch? You don\'t know who is a Town member and who is a villain. If you are an evil role, such as a Serial Killer, you secretly murder town members in the veil of night and try to avoid getting caught. (Summary provided by BlankMediaGames)
